section.heading: Time-Share Registration.
section.text: After giving the registrant 15 days written notice, and an opportunity to have a hearing before the Secretary of State, the Secretary may:

para.text: Suspend or terminate approval of a time-share public offering statement; or
Suspend or terminate the approval order for a time-share public offering statement.

section.heading: Condominium Registration.
section.text: After giving the registrant 15 days written notice, and an opportunity to have a hearing before the Secretary of State, the Secretary may:

para.text: Suspend or terminate approval of a condominium public offering statement; or
Suspend or terminate the approval order for a condominium public offering statement.
